org.opends.server.tools.upgrade

Class UpgradeTasks

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.tools.upgrade.UpgradeTasks

  • public final class UpgradeTasks
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory methods for create new upgrade tasks.

      • addConfigEntry

        public static UpgradeTask addConfigEntry(Message summary,
                         java.lang.String... ldif)
        Returns a new upgrade task which applies an LDIF record to all configuration entries matching the provided filter.
        Parameters:
        summary - The summary of this upgrade task.
        ldif - The LDIF record which will be applied to matching entries.
        Returns:
        A new upgrade task which applies an LDIF record to all configuration entries matching the provided filter.

      • copySchemaFile

        public static UpgradeTask copySchemaFile(java.lang.String fileName)
        This task copies the file placed in parameter within the config / schema folder. If the file already exists, it's overwritten.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file which need to be copied.
        Returns:
        A task which copy the the file placed in parameter within the config / schema folder. If the file already exists, it's overwritten.

        This task copies the file placed in parameter within the config folder. If the file already exists, it's overwritten.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file which need to be copied.
        Returns:
        A task which copy the the file placed in parameter within the config folder. If the file already exists, it's overwritten.

        public static UpgradeTask modifyConfigEntry(Message summary,
                            java.lang.String filter,
                            java.lang.String... ldif)
        Returns a new upgrade task which applies an LDIF record to all configuration entries matching the provided filter.
        Parameters:
        summary - The summary of this upgrade task.
        filter - The LDAP filter which configuration entries must match.
        ldif - The LDIF record which will be applied to matching entries.
        Returns:
        A new upgrade task which applies an LDIF record to all configuration entries matching the provided filter.

      • newAttributeTypes

        public static UpgradeTask newAttributeTypes(Message summary,
                            java.lang.String fileName,
                            java.lang.String... names)
        This task adds a new attribute type (must exists in the original file) to the specified file placed in parameter. The destination must be a file contained in the config/schema folder. E.g : This example adds a new attribute type named 'etag' in the 00.core.ldif. The 'etag' attribute already exists in the 00-core.ldif template schema file. 
         register("2.5.0.7192",
   newAttributeTypes(Message.raw("New attribute etag"),
   false, "00-core.ldif", "etag"));
        Parameters:
        summary - The summary of the task.
        fileName - The file where to add the new attribute types. This file must be contained in the config/schema folder.
        names - The names of the new attributes to add to.
        Returns:
        An upgrade task which adds new attribute types, defined previously in the config template files, reads the definition and adds it onto the specified file in parameter.

      • newObjectClasses

        public static UpgradeTask newObjectClasses(Message summary,
                           java.lang.String fileName,
                           java.lang.String... names)
        This task adds a new object class (must exists in the original file) to the specified file placed in parameter. The destination must be a file contained in the config/schema folder.
        Parameters:
        summary - The summary of the task.
        fileName - The file where to add the new object classes. This file must be contained in the config/schema folder.
        names - The names of the new object classes to add to.
        Returns:
        An upgrade task which adds new object classes, defined previously in the config template files, reads the definition and adds it onto the specified file in parameter.

      • regressionInVersion

        public static UpgradeTask regressionInVersion(java.lang.String versionString,
                              UpgradeTask... tasks)
        Creates a group of tasks which will only be invoked if the current version is more recent than the provided version. This may be useful in cases where a regression was introduced in version X and resolved in a later version Y. In this case, the provided upgrade tasks will only be invoked if the current version is between X (inclusive) and Y (exclusive).
        Parameters:
        versionString - The lower bound version. The upgrade tasks will not be applied if the current version is older than this version.
        tasks - The group of tasks to invoke if the current version is equal to or more recent than versionString.
        Returns:
        An upgrade task which will only be invoked if the current version is more recent than the provided version.

      • rebuildAllIndexes

        public static UpgradeTask rebuildAllIndexes(Message summary)
        Creates a rebuild all indexes task.
        Parameters:
        summary - The summary of this upgrade task.
        Returns:
        An Upgrade task which rebuild all the indexes.

      • rebuildSingleIndex

        public static UpgradeTask rebuildSingleIndex(Message summary)
        Creates a rebuild index task for a single index. At the moment this is implemented as a simple stub which displays a message which should prompt the user to rebuild the index manually once the upgrade has completed.

        In future this task should register the index to be rebuilt in a table. A subsequent task executed at the end of the upgrade process will then obtain the set of indexes to be rebuilt, optimize it (e.g. removing duplicates), and perform the rebuild.

        Parameters:
        summary - A message describing why the index needs to be rebuilt and asking them whether or not they wish to continue.
        Returns:
        The rebuild index task.

      • updateConfigUpgradeFolder

        public static UpgradeTask updateConfigUpgradeFolder()
        Creates a file object representing config/upgrade/schema.ldif.current which the server creates the first time it starts if there are schema customizations.
        Returns:
        An upgrade task which upgrade the config/upgrade folder, creating a new schema.ldif.rev which is needed after schema customization for starting correctly the server.

      • renameSnmpSecurityConfig

        public static UpgradeTask renameSnmpSecurityConfig(Message summary)
        Renames the SNMP security config file if it exists. Since 2.5.0.7466 this file has been renamed.
        Parameters:
        summary - The summary of this upgrade task.
        Returns:
        An upgrade task which renames the old SNMP security config file if it exists.
